title: Ticket #7560: condor_qedit confusing editing multiples
description:
Stuart reports: 

What is the intended behavior of,
condor_qedit job1 job2 attr1 value1 attr2 value2


For example, I am confused by the output from,

[root@ldas-pcdev1 ~]# condor_qedit 141147986.0 141147987.0 abc 1 def 2
Set attribute "abc" for 2 matching jobs.
Set attribute "def" for 4 matching jobs.

In particular, the 2 requested jobs have been modified,

[root@ldas-pcdev1 condor]# condor_q 141147986.0 -af abc def
1 2
[root@ldas-pcdev1 condor]# condor_q 141147987.0 -af abc def
1 2

however what are the other 2 matching jobs for "def"?
remarks:
2020-May-12 10:42:49 by pfc:
Todd M. says he thinks part of the existing behavior is buggy and not just non-optimal.

2021-Jan-19 15:22:52 by tlmiller:
Closing as duplicate of #7520.
creator: gthain
